DataElement.preferredName: MET Amplification Detection Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical study that are related to identifying the abnormality indicating the presence of multiple copies of the MET gene as outlined in the protocol.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has MET amplification been de
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has MET amplification been detected by the Guardant360 cfDNA screening assay?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has MET amplification been detected by the Guardant360 cfDNA screening assay (MET copy number greater than or equal to 2.2)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the activation of MET pathway previously identified using local CLIA test been confirmed by subsequent FDA approved test?  (Please wait until FDA approved test results are available to answer this question.)
